page.title: 13LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: Many children and adults spend their leisure at a "Leisure Centre". A leisure centre is a complex of buildings where people can take part in various sports such as Badminton, Tennis, Rollerskating, Putting and Swimming. There are two swimming pools and a bar only open to adults. At home a lot of adults do Gardening, Do-it-Yourself and watch television. Some take part in sports such as Football, Rugby and Cricket. Some have hobbies - stamp collecting, photography, crafts and breeding birds. Most children watch television at some time of the day.
